metadata.title: CVE-2020-1712 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A heap use-after-free vulnerability was found in systemd before versionv245-rc1, where asynchronous Polkit queries are performed while handlingdbus messages. A local unprivileged attacker can abuse this flaw to crashsystemd services or potentially execute code and elevate their privileges,by sending specially crafted dbus messages.

criterions.comment: systemd package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
systemd package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
